content: उपस्थित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Approached, arrived, come (person or thing); तस्मिन्नंतरे भर्तोपस्थितः <ls>M. 1</ls>; °श्रेयोऽ वमानिनं <ls>Ś. 6</ls>; <ls>K. 157</ls>; <ls>Ms. 3. 243</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 62</ls>; चिंतित° <ls>Ku. 6. 24</ls> come as soon as thought of. {@--2@} Close or near, at hand, impending, drawing near; उपस्थिता रजनी <ls>Ś. 3</ls> the night is at hand (arrived); °संप्रहारः <ls>V. 1</ls>; °उदयं <ls>R. 3. 1</ls> approaching its fulfilment; <ls>Māl. 10</ls>; <ls>Ratn. 1</ls>; <ls>R. 14. 39.</ls> {@--3@} Worshipped or waited upon, served. {@--4@} Got, obtained, received; अयाचित° <ls>Ku. 5. 22</ls> got without solicitation; अचिंतित° <ls>Pt. 2.</ls> {@--5@} Taken place, happened, occurred, fallen to the lot; <ls>V. 5. 16.</ls> {@--6@} Caused, occasioned, produced, felt. {@--7@} Known. {@--8@} Cleansed, clean. {@--9@} Followed by the particle इति in the Pada text. --तं {@--1@} The particle used in this manner. {@--2@} The position of words before and after इति so used. {@--3@} Service, worship.
